mapper.select: SELECT pp.*, d1.dict_label as project_type_name, d2.dict_label as project_level_name, d3.dict_label as project_role_name, d4.dict_label as project_status_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, pp.start_date, IFNULL(pp.end_date, NOW())) as project_duration FROM person_project pp LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d1 ON pp.project_type = d1.dict_value AND d1.dict_type = 'project_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON pp.project_level = d2.dict_value AND d2.dict_type = 'project_level' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d3 ON pp.project_role = d3.dict_value AND d3.dict_type = 'project_role' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d4 ON pp.project_status = d4.dict_value AND d4.dict_type = 'project_status' WHERE pp.person_id = #{personId} ORDER BY pp.start_date DESC
mapper.insert:
